courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar with our comprehensive beginner's course.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Start your musical journey with foundational piano skills taught by expert instructors.

courses.description: Master advanced guitar techniques including solos, scales, and improvisation.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the building blocks of music including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Drums for Beginners
courses.description: Learn rhythm, timing, and basic drum patterns in this beginner-friendly course.

courses.title: Vocal Training Basics
courses.description: Improve your singing voice with proper breathing, pitch control, and vocal exercises.

courses.title: Digital Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to create, mix, and produce music using modern digital tools and software.
